body.p: Paragraphs BC4.6–BC4.7 explain the Board’s decision to introduce a separate definition of an economic resource and paragraphs BC4.8–BC4.14 discuss the Board’s decision to remove the notion of expected flows from the definition of an asset and not to include that notion in the definition of an economic resource.
